name: Zombie Hill Racing - Earn To Climb
name_original: Zombie Hill Racing - Earn To Climb
description:
"The apocalypse already fell upon our land! Zombies roam the country and there is almost no escape! The only thing left is to find a car and drive through the hills full of chaos...

Features
- Different vehicles at your disposal
- Hordes of zombies to drive through
- Earn coins and customize your vehicle
- Varied range of zombies to kill
- Various environments to discover
- The game to die for

Challenge yourself inside a zombie apocalypse world in this racing survival battle! Train your hill racing skills as a survivor and don't die in front line fighting the walking dead.

Earn as much coins as you can, build your ultimate zombie killing machine and destroy the hordes of zombies roaming in the hills. You don't want to join those walking dead, you want to survive!

Don't die along with the zombies, crash through hordes of walking dead, climb hills - you got to get away! Good Luck Zombie Killer

Zombie Hill Racing - Earn To Climb team
